This International Men's Day, doctors urge attention to five key red flags: unusual pelvic/testicular changes, chest discomfort, unmonitored blood pressure/diabetes, altered bowel habits, and mental health struggles. Early detection is vital for better outcomes, especially as chronic diseases affect younger men.

The performer, Payal Choudhary, was attacked on stage when she pushed away a man's hand holding currency notes. The assault escalated, with multiple individuals joining in, and other dancers and an intervener were also beaten.

title: Watch: Names of children killed in Gaza read out in Thiruvananthapuram
description: Manaveeyam Veedhi in Thiruvananthapuram turned into a space of remembrance on November 16. People gathered on the cultural street to read out the names of children killed in Gaza, making sure their identities were not lost in numbers. The event, called The Names of Gaza and organised by the Chinta Ravi Foundation, brought together activists, civil society members and ordinary citizens.

The letter accuses the opposition of baseless rhetoric and "systematic and conspiratorial attacks" against the ECI, urging civil society to support the institution.

Refineries are now wary of US penalties, leading to reduced new orders and expedited existing ones. This shift forces Russian exporters to adopt more opaque shipping methods to navigate sanctions.

He paid homage at the Mahasamadhi, released a commemorative coin and postal stamps, and later traveled to Coimbatore to inaugurate the South India Natural Farming Summit and release the 21st installment of PM-KISAN.

description: Shannon Sharpe's podcast comments resurfaced, suggesting emotional fulfillment, not wealth, may have driven Gisele Bündchen's divorce from Tom Brady. Sharpe theorized that despite Brady's fortune, unmet needs for time and attention could have eroded their 13-year marriage. This perspective continues to resonate, highlighting that financial security alone cannot sustain relationships under pressure.

NASA to unveil rare imagery of interstellar comet 3I ATLAS on 19 November 2025
description: NASA is set to unveil stunning new images of the rare interstellar comet 3I/ATLAS, a visitor from another star system. Discovered earlier this year, this marks only the third such object observed in our solar system. The live event will offer insights into its journey and composition, providing a unique glimpse into distant cosmic environments.

title: Who is Dak Prescott’s fiancée? Meet Sarah Jane Ramos and her $1M ring
description: Dallas Cowboys quarterback Dak Prescott and fiancée Sarah Jane Ramos are embracing parenthood with their two daughters, Margaret Jane Rose and Aurora Rayne. Ramos, a former wine industry professional with a passion for hockey, has been a steadfast partner through Prescott's career highs and personal milestones. Their growing family signifies a strong bond and shared commitment.

title: NBA trade rumor: Rockets eye $118M Mavericks star in blockbuster deal
description: Houston Rockets, surprisingly strong early, are exploring a blockbuster trade for Kyrie Irving to fill the void left by Fred VanVleet's season-ending injury. This move would reunite Irving with Kevin Durant, a partnership that previously generated significant excitement. The proposed deal involves trading VanVleet and Dorian Finney-Smith for Irving, offering Houston a veteran playmaker and elite scorer.

title: LiAngelo Ball turns rapper: 'Tweaker' hits platinum, shock crossover
description: LiAngelo Ball, formerly a basketball player, has achieved a major milestone in music. His debut single 'Tweaker' has gone platinum. This success signifies a significant crossover from sports to the entertainment industry. The song became a cultural phenomenon, embraced by sports teams and charting highly. Ball's journey redefines his public identity and highlights his artistic ambition.

title: Tech firm whose founder beat Musk as world's richest for a day loses 30% market value
description: Larry Ellison briefly surpassed Elon Musk in wealth after Oracle's stock surged on a massive OpenAI cloud deal. However, Oracle's value has since plummeted, erasing those gains and pushing Ellison down the rankings. Musk has since reclaimed his top spot, driven by strong performance in Tesla and SpaceX.
